name: Anime-Inspired Book Tracker Notion Template
description: A free, anime-inspired Notion book tracker that lets you organize your books into shelves. This minimalist, aesthetic Notion template is perfect for anyone seeking a basic library template.This template does not include a daily reading tracker, but you're welcome to add one of your own!
